channel.title: Shadow pk 317 | torva and korasi | no lagg! | perfect pvm and pking!

[COLOR="#800080"]It's Free Sosa and today I introduce you to a new server called: Shadow Pk. It has so many features. It's almost not even real. But here are the pictures to show you the truth!
